snippet: Secretary of State John Kerry added the visit in part to answer criticism that the U.S. had sent only an ambassador to a rally in Paris that drew leaders from 40 countries.
lead_paragraph: Secretary of State John Kerry added the visit in part to answer criticism that the U.S. had sent only an ambassador to a rally in Paris that drew leaders from 40 countries.

headline.main: Kerry Says He’ll Fly to France to Show U.S. Solidarity
headline.print_headline: Kerry Says He’ll Fly to France to Show U.S. Solidarity
